universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Class TextAppearance

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.ui.widget.TextAppearance

  • public final class TextAppearance
extends Object
    TextAppearance contains attributes that can be specified to 'describe' appearance of a text that is drawn on Canvas. See TextAppearance attributes to see which attributes can be specified.

    An instance of TextAppearance object can be instantiated via TextAppearance() constructor and then values for the desired attributes can be specified vie one of setter methods or they can be parsed form a desired text appearance style via fromStyle(Context, int) and than accessed via one of getter methods.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  TextAppearance.TextStyle
      Defines an annotation for determining set of available text styles.
      static interface  TextAppearance.TypefaceIndex
      Defines an annotation for determining set of typeface indexes used to identify a specific typeface.

    • Method Detail

      • fromStyle

        public boolean fromStyle(@NonNull
                         Context context,
                         @StyleRes
                         int resId)
        Set ups this text appearance holder with text appearance values from the specified resId style.
        Parameters:
        context - Context used to parse text appearance attributes from the specified style resource.
        resId - Resource id of the desired TextAppearance style from which to parse attributes.
        Returns:
        True if some of attributes of this text appearance has changed, false otherwise.

      • setTextSize

        public boolean setTextSize(float size)
        Sets a size for text.
        Parameters:
        size - The desired text size in floating pixels.
        Returns:
        True if text size of this text appearance has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getTextSize()

      • getTextSize

        public float getTextSize()
        Returns the size for text specified for this text appearance.

        Default value: 0

        Returns:
        This appearance's text size.
        See Also:
        setTextSize(float), updatePaintTextSize(Paint)

      • setTextColor

        public boolean setTextColor(@Nullable
                            ColorStateList colors)
        Sets a stateful set of colors for text.
        Parameters:
        colors - The desired colors. May be null to clear the current ones.
        Returns:
        True if colors of this text appearance have changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getTextColor()

      • getTextColor

        @NonNull
public ColorStateList getTextColor()
        Returns the colors for text specified for this text appearance.

        If no colors has been specified the TEXT_COLORS is returned by default.

        Returns:
        This appearance's text colors.
        See Also:
        setTextColor(ColorStateList), updatePaintColor(Paint, int[])

      • setTextStyle

        public boolean setTextStyle(int style)
        Sets a style for text.
        Parameters:
        style - The desired text style. One of Typeface.NORMAL, Typeface.ITALIC, Typeface.BOLD, Typeface.BOLD_ITALIC.
        Returns:
        True if text style of this text appearance has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getTextStyle()

      • getTextStyle

        public int getTextStyle()
        Returns the style for text specified for this text appearance.
        Returns:
        This appearance's text size.
        See Also:
        setTextStyle(int), updatePaintTypeface(Paint)

      • setTypefaceIndex

        public boolean setTypefaceIndex(int index)
        Sets an index of typeface for text.

        This index will be used to resolve proper instance of typeface whenever it is requested via getTypeface() and some of typeface related attributes have changed.

        Parameters:
        index - The desired typeface index. One of SANS_SERIF, SERIF, MONOSPACE.
        Returns:
        True if index of typeface of this text appearance has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getTypefaceIndex(), setTypeface(Typeface), setFontFamily(String)

      • getTypefaceIndex

        public int getTypefaceIndex()
        Returns the index of typeface for text specified for this text appearance.
        Returns:
        This appearance's typeface index.
        See Also:
        setTypefaceIndex(int), updatePaintTypeface(Paint)

      • setTypeface

        public boolean setTypeface(@Nullable
                           Typeface typeface)
        Sets a typeface for text.
        Parameters:
        typeface - The desired typeface. May be null to clear the current one.
        Returns:
        True if typeface of this text appearance has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getTypeface(), setTypefaceIndex(int), setFontFamily(String)

      • getTypeface

        @Nullable
public Typeface getTypeface()
        Returns the typeface for text specified for this text appearance.

        Note, that whenever one of typeface related attributes (text style, typeface index, font family) changes and this method is invoked a new proper instance of typeface will be resolved based on current values of these attributes.

        Returns:
        This appearance's typeface.
        See Also:
        updatePaintTypeface(Paint)

      • setFontFamily

        public boolean setFontFamily(@Nullable
                             String fontFamily)
        Sets a font family for text's typeface.

        Font family will be used to resolve proper instance of typeface whenever it is requested via getTypeface() and some of typeface related attributes have changed.

        Parameters:
        fontFamily - The desired font family. May be null to clear the current one.
        Returns:
        True if font family of this text appearance has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getFontFamily()

      • hasFontFamily

        public boolean hasFontFamily()
        Checks whether this text appearance has its font family specified or not.
        Returns:
        True if font family is specified, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        setFontFamily(String), getFontFamily()

      • getFontFamily

        @Nullable
public String getFontFamily()
        Returns the font family for text's typeface specified for this text appearance.
        Returns:
        This appearance's font family.
        See Also:
        hasFontFamily(), setFontFamily(String), updatePaintTypeface(Paint)

      • updatePaint

        public boolean updatePaint(@NonNull
                           Paint paint,
                           @Nullable
                           int[] stateSet)
        Updates all text related settings for the given paint with current configuration of this text appearance.
        Parameters:
        paint - The paint to be updated.
        stateSet - Set of states used to resolve actual value of stateful text setting like its color.
        Returns:
        True if at least one setting of the paint has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        updatePaintTextSize(Paint), updatePaintColor(Paint, int[]), updatePaintTypeface(Paint)

      • updatePaintTextSize

        public boolean updatePaintTextSize(@NonNull
                                   Paint paint)
        Updates text size setting for the given paint to the one specified for this text appearance.
        Parameters:
        paint - The paint to be updated.
        Returns:
        True if paint's text setting has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        setTextSize(float), updatePaintTextSize(Paint, float)

      • updatePaintTextSize

        public static boolean updatePaintTextSize(@NonNull
                                          Paint paint,
                                          float textSize)
        Updates text size setting for the given paint to the specified one.
        Parameters:
        paint - The paint to be updated.
        textSize - The desired text size in floating pixels.
        Returns:
        True if paint's text setting has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Paint.setTextSize(float)

      • updatePaintColor

        public boolean updatePaintColor(@NonNull
                                Paint paint,
                                @Nullable
                                int[] stateSet)
        Updates color setting for the given paint to the one specified for this text appearance.
        Parameters:
        paint - The paint to be updated.
        stateSet - Set of states used to resolve actual color from the stateful text colors specified for this text appearance (if any).
        Returns:
        True if paint's color setting has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        setTextColor(ColorStateList), updatePaintColor(Paint, int[], ColorStateList)

      • updatePaintColor

        public static boolean updatePaintColor(@NonNull
                                       Paint paint,
                                       @Nullable
                                       int[] stateSet,
                                       @Nullable
                                       ColorStateList colors)
        Updates color setting for the given paint to the actual one picked from the given colors according to the specified stateSet.
        Parameters:
        paint - The paint to be updated.
        stateSet - Set of states used pick the actual color to set to the paint.
        colors - Stateful colors list to the actual color from.
        Returns:
        True if paint's color setting has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        updatePaintColor(Paint, int)

      • updatePaintColor

        public static boolean updatePaintColor(@NonNull
                                       Paint paint,
                                       int color)
        Updates color setting for the given paint the the specified one.
        Parameters:
        paint - The paint to be updated.
        color - The desired color.
        Returns:
        True if paint's color setting has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Paint.setColor(int)

      • updatePaintTypeface

        public boolean updatePaintTypeface(@NonNull
                                   Paint paint)
        Updates typeface setting for the given paint to the one specified for this text appearance.
        Parameters:
        paint - The paint to be updated.
        Returns:
        True if paint's typeface setting has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        setTypeface(Typeface), updatePaintTypeface(Paint, Typeface, int)

      • updatePaintTypeface

        public static boolean updatePaintTypeface(@NonNull
                                          Paint paint,
                                          @Nullable
                                          Typeface typeface,
                                          int style)
        Updates typeface setting for the given paint to the specified one.
        Parameters:
        paint - The paint to be updated.
        typeface - The desired typeface. May be null to resolve instance of typeface from the specified style.
        style - The desired text style used to resolve proper instance of typeface.
        Returns:
        True if paint's typeface setting has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Paint.setTypeface(Typeface)

      • updatePaintTypeface

        public static boolean updatePaintTypeface(@NonNull
                                          Paint paint,
                                          @Nullable
                                          Typeface typeface)
        Updates typeface setting for the given paint to the specified one.
        Parameters:
        paint - The paint to be updated.
        typeface - The desired typeface.
        Returns:
        True if paint's typeface setting has changed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
